name: Ludumkula
description:
You are in debt to the most powerful mafia "Ludumkula" in the world. He is torturing everybody in the town. Somebody has to do something. You Angutio have that power in your blood. Choose your path now. Do you want to save yourself and everyone in your town? Or just give him whatever he wants until you die.

Or you can just suck everyone's blood until you become strong enough to be the new Ludumkula

Your battle will be legendary!

  • Use your abilities to pass multiple levels.
  • Unlock new abilities from your local potion dealer.
  • Don't forget to defeat Ludumkula!

Controls

  • A - D or Arrow Keys to Move
  • W or Up Arrow to Jump
  • X and Z to use your abilities
  • Space to suck blood
